title: Covered in Mud, Facing the Sunrise

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
"El Condor Pasa accepts the challenge of a rookie 
Umamusume." This race is gonna be broadcast live 
over the Internet. It's a real festival.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
By the way, I know you made me train for pitch running, 
but… it's usually the opposite if we are competing on grass. 
Shouldn't I be running with a wider stride?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Since pitch running uses a short stride, its high turnover 
increases acceleration, but it wears out the runner quickly… 
It's good for dirt races or sprints, yeah?

I had chosen to rent out the freestyle race track instead of the 
on-campus course. The turf there isn't well maintained and 
running there requires a lot of power.

What is required is not a running technique geared towards 
domestic turf courses. It is a technique that can be used all 
over the world, no matter what kind of surface it is on.
choice_data_list:
You're going to go out there 
and win against the world.

You're going to go out there 
and win against the world.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Whew, that's one big ask. 
Guess I should check out the track too.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
That course is different from the school's. The turf's 
different, the soil's different. …If you wanna strategize, 
you start planning there.

I wonder if she anticipated that? The night before the race, 
heavy rain suddenly began to fall.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
The forecast's cleared up and we're looking 
at sunny skies! At last, the live broadcast 
of El Condor Pasa's race is about to begin!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
…But when I looked into it, I found that her 
opponent really was just a rookie. I was hoping 
to see a serious race from El Condor Pasa…

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
Well, it's a good thing that El's racing is being recorded 
live on camera. If her opponent loses spectacularly, 
her performance will look better.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Yeesh, talk about a warm welcome. 
You're the one they're all betting on, El.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
It's only natural. I am the condor who flew to the ends 
of the earth. With my expectations and responsibilities, 
I'll knock you off your feet.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
…Heheh. Seems that she's still wet behind the ears. 
Is it confidence or immaturity? Either way ——

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: —— Try not to run like shit this time.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
And they're out of the gates! The track may still be muddy, but 
it's no match for the "Monster Bird" El Condor Pasa, who has 
already taken on the world!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
(I see. It's like you'd expect from someone who's competed 
around the world. Her ability to concentrate and acceleration 
is quite exceptional… that's enough to hand her the win.)

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Nakayama Festa has slowed down! Is she unable 
to keep up with El Condor Pasa's pace?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: …Tch. Let me set the pace then!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, El Condor Pasa remains in front. With a comfortable lead, 
she can afford to slow down to keep her stamina up.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Of course this gaggle is bird-brained too. She's not just 
slowing down for no reason. I'm gonna take a closer look 
at where they're running.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Tch, damnit. El is moving towards the outside. 
Has she noticed… the unusual effect occurring 
due to the track?

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
There's a big puddle on the inside of the 3rd and 4th corners! 
But Pasa goes around it! This is the luck of a champion!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
It wasn't luck, it was just a matter of getting to the outside. 
The puddles turned that spot into a swamp. It's impossible 
to get ahead from the inside. Which means…

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
('Cause I'm behind El, I have no choice but to run 
further outside than her. That or the mud? Either way, 
I'll lose stamina. Just as I thought…)

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: I don't need a safe tile!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: …! No way!?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
Hey! That girl ran through the mud at full speed! She can take 
shortcuts, but she's still at risk of slipping and falling over!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
(Yes! It's do or die! My heart is pounding! This is what racing 
is all about. This is what competition is all about! This is ——)

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: A place where I… where I can live!!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
This is the world's El Condor Pasa! Behold her flapping wings! 
What a perfect run! There is no other Umamusume more worthy 
of challenging the world!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
El really is that good, huh? The masses are giddy with 
excitement over your performance after all these years. 
…Yet you're only hanging on by a thread.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Huff… huff… That's mean, Sirius. Even though I'm 
coming off a break, Nakayama is a novice, a work 
in progress who still has room to grow.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
If they are happy with this level of victory, they'll be elated 
next time. But it's a matter of winning the next time. I'll be 
the first to take the world.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
…Hey hey, So that's the attitude of a person 
who was looking for a successor. Hahaha…

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Well, the bird you fail to kill is the first to fly away! 
If Nakayama dreams of Paris, she better sharpen her claws. 
The world doesn't wait for you to catch up to it.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Haah… Well, it was what we expected from the champion. In the end, the challenger was just a big talker with some eccentric techniques. It was pretty exciting though.

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
Well, maybe that girl could get an article if we ever get a 
follow up on her. How far will the girl who cried wolf fall? 
…There's a demographic who likes bad endings, right?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Hahaaaaah. This is a huge loss. I haven't even debuted 
and I've already made a fool of myself.
choice_data_list: <size=34>But you got attention. This is just the beginning.</size>

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Haah, that's for sure. The look in the reporters' 
eyes has changed. If we flunk the next race, 
the articles will be scathing. Keheheh…

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
The odds are absolutely against me! I'm not just fired up, 
my heart's begging me to get ready for the next race!
choice_data_list: <size=38>So, will you officially sign a contract with me?</size>
<size=38>So, will you officially sign a contract with me?</size>

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Haha. What's the point of getting all formal about it now? 
We're both already on the same sinking ship, right?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Become my trainer. And ——

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: —— Keep me alive as long as you can, yeah?
